name: botframework-webchat
description: A highly-customizable web-based chat client for Azure Bot Services.
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.build: npm run build:tsup && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:babel && npm run build:webpack
scripts.build:babel: cross-env build_tool=babel module_format=commonjs babel src --extensions .js,.ts,.tsx --ignore **/*.spec.js,**/*.spec.ts,**/*.spec.tsx,**/*.test.js,**/*.test.ts,**/*.test.tsx,__tests__/**/*.js,__tests__/**/*.ts,__tests__/**/*.tsx --out-dir lib --verbose
scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && (npm audit fix || exit 0)
scripts.bump:dev: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $P | (.localPeerDependencies // []) as $L | (.devDependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | contains([$K]) | not)) | map(.key + "@" + ($P[.key] // ["latest"])[0]) | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.bump:prod: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $P | (.localPeerDependencies // []) as $L | (.dependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | contains([$K]) | not)) | map(.key + "@" + ($P[.key] // ["latest"])[0]) | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install --save-exact $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.postversion: cat package.json | jq '.version as $V | . + (.dependencies = (.dependencies + ((.localPeerDependencies // []) | map({(.): $V }) | add)) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries) + (.devDependencies = (.devDependencies + ((.localPeerDevDependencies // []) | map({(.): $V }) | add)) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries)'
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:eslint -- src && npm run precommit:typecheck
scripts.preversion: cat package.json | jq '(((.localPeerDependencies // []) | map(["dependencies", .])) + ((.localPeerDevDependencies // []) | map(["devDependencies", .]))) as $localPeerPaths | delpaths($localPeerPaths)' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json

markdown-it: markdown-it@14.1.0 has module field and it is breaking Webpack 4 because cross loading CJS and ESM
swiper: required by Adaptive Cards but they forget to include in adaptivecards@3.0.2
uuid: uuid@9 emit non-ES5 build because of default parameters
